description:
7mesh has updated their do-it-all trail short and the results are comfy. From sessioning your favorite trails, to all-day gravel grinds, the Glidepath shorts feel as good as they look. Little features like the flat lay waistband that tucks under your hip pack and the side opening pockets that let you grab your phone while still in the saddle, are just a few of the reasons the Glidepath might become your go to shorts.

  • Stretchy nylon blend has a DWR finish to help keep you safe from the elements
  • Looped backing helps wick away moisture
  • Paneled construction with an improved gusset for enhanced mobility
  • Plenty of pockets with 2 hand pockets and 2 deep, zippered side pockets that are easy to access when in the saddle
  • Low-profile hook and ladder waist adjuster is easy to adjust, even when gloved up
  • Relaxed fit with a slightly tapered leg, leaves room for a liner and your knee pads
  • 7mesh has a crash replacement program, so if you damage your gear within the first 30 days of purchase, 7mesh will (at their discretion) repair or replace your item. They can even help you keep your old gear going, helping to repair crashed apparel, charging only a small fee to cover the service
name: 7mesh Glidepath Shorts - Men's
